info.name: simpler reddit
info.description:
A very quick take on making reddit less ugly.

Inspired by the Georgify extension for Hacker News
   https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ofjfdfaleomlfanfehgblppafkijjhmi

A fair amount of functionality is hidden (sidebar, footer, voting arrows, etc)
info.additionalInfo:
## v3

- styles for comments

## v2

- fixes domain span being styled just like the rest of the link title.
